description: A ban on non-essential travel on the island has led to a drop in road accidents, say police.
title: Coronavirus: Police praise Manx people for staying at home
title_page: Coronavirus: Police praise Manx people for staying at home - BBC News
maintext: Figures show there have been just two crashes on the island's roads since restrictions were introduced, compared to an average of up to two per day during the same period in previous years.
